statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-5 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x , -6 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - x - 5 , 5 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - x - 4 , 5 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 3 \, x + 3 , -27 \, x^{3} - 8 \, x^{2} + 6 \, x + 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
